about_the_game:
Super Value Pack: One Hairstyle and Three Outfits for Each Character!


  • 1. Erza Hairstyle - Bunny Ears
  • 2. Erza Outfit - Dealer Costume

short_description: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands.Erza leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach. When they break through all difficulties and reaches the destination, what awaits them is...
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
